sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop conducts Land Navigation on Land Nav South IOT practice land navigation both day and night IOT prepare for E3B Land Navigation as well as sharpen basic soldiering skills, IAW TC 3-25.26.
COMMANDERS
sections.PURPOSE:
of this exercise is to train basic soldier skills and improve land navigation skills IOT prepare for E3B. TRAINING OBJECTIVES:
Increase Troop lethality through deliberate Land Navigation train-up
Safe
sections.CONCEPT OF OPERATION:
Phase I: Plan/Prep
Phase II: Refresher and Written Test
Phase III: Land Navigation
sections.TASKS:
TO SUBS:
LT Burns: Establish lanes, backside support, and TOC for Range.
SSG Luna: Develop Lesson Plan for Land Navigation Refresher and Written Test.
07-09 OCT 2025
CORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
EIB Holders will be backside support for most of the range. They will switch off with each other to practice their skills.
Land Navigation Refresher and written test will need to be completed before 07OCT25.
